text: Winfried Menrad (10 February 1939 – 26 August 2016) was a German politician. A member of the Christian Democratic Union, Menrad served in the European Parliament from 1989 to 2004. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1939 births Category:2016 deaths Category:Christian Democratic Union of Germany MEPs Category:MEPs for Germany 1989–1994 Category:MEPs for Germany 1994–1999 Category:MEPs for Germany 1999–2004
title: Winfried Menrad
